title: LF ADC
body:
Hello there.

Truth Gaming Corps is looking for an ADC to participate in the Friday night games.

Team experience would be preferred, however we will be willing to take on newer summoners.

Minimum requirements:
- Must know bot lane matchups.
- Must be able to CS well.
- Must be able to communicate.
- Must have comms.

-------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE FILL OUT IN COMMENTS!

Summoner Name:
Current Rank:
Season 5 Rank:
Top Five ADC Champions:
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?:

-------------------------------------------------------

I look forward to hearing from you.

replies.body:
Summoner Name: MaccaM8
Current Rank: S5
Season 5 Rank:B1 (S3 Preseason)
Top Five ADC Champions: Twitch Vayne Tristana Lucian Jinx
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: take the next step and share my knowledge.
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Maccam8
have you had any experience in teams before?
Moderate experiance in teams but nothing too serious before

Summoner Name: Apeksu LFT
Current Rank: Plat 3
Season 5 Rank: Diamond 4
Top Five ADC Champions: {{champion:81}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:202}} 
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: To experience a team environment amd develop better teamwork rather than just entirely solo play

Summoner name : Old Wizard
Current rank: Platinum 5
Season high: Plat 1 (diamond 2 mmr)
Top 5 adc champions : Ashe, Sivir, Ezreal, Draven, I can honestly do all of em though
I wanna join a team because I want to become a pro.

Currently, the team is quite low elo, but we have had a couple of guys that have been in the team that have moved on to try for challenger teams... If you join the team, then all that would happen for you would just be the experience of being in a team.
Sounds good, so what team did those guys try for?
Not sure mate, they just told me they couldnt play anymore because they went into tryouts for challenger teams

Summoner Name: Deep Sanity
Current Rank: B3
Season 5 Rank: B1 but got to s3 in preseason
Top Five ADC Champions: Vayne Jinx Tristana Twitch Lucian
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: to improve as a player and become better
I believe i have you in my friends list already? or am i mistaken?
message me if you see me on

Summoner name: Hinobi (smurf)
Current rank challenger (on main) 
Season 5 rank: challenger (in main)
Top 5 adc champions: Lucian, sivir, cait, ezreal, and sivir.
I would like to join a team again as I'm ex opl and I enjoy the competitive environment while knowing you're playing with good mates. I also enjoy learning more in this type or area.

Summoner Name: bgentle2myashe
Current Rank: b1
Season 5 Rank: b4
Top Five ADC Champions: Ashe, Jhin, MF, Varus, Corki and Cait
Why Do You Want To Join A Team?: I don't have a regular team to play with and I'm making any and every effort to try to climb and improve.
